Description:
Responsibilities:Work with a multi-disciplinary team to translate the client’s business requirements into a solution vision and high-level architecture.
Lead detailed design, implementation and integrations as part of large complex agile projects or product engineering teams.
Lead globally distributed teams of AEM, integration and QA engineers to implement the solution with a combination of architectural leadership and hands-on implementation.
Use your deep understanding of Digital Experience Platforms to provide thought leadership to our clients and internal teams on best leveraging the Adobe suite products.
A deep knowledge of modern web frameworks and web architecture best practices and patterns.
Be accountable for the overall quality and performance of the solution.
Anticipate issues and risks at the module level and work with program leadership to escalate and solve the problems appropriately.
Strong experience with build script and CI CD and GIT, Jenkins or similar.The Role Offers:To analyze, understand the client’s business use cases and technical requirements.
To be able to design, build & integrate AEM Platform Templates, Components, Services to internal and external applications.Essential Skills:Hands-on-Experience in Content Management Systems in general, with at least 9 years of specific AEM experience required along with AEM 6.3+ version experience is ideal.
Strong working knowledge of AEM/Adobe CQ/Digital Marketing Suite.
Experience designing modules and components.
Experience in end to end implementations of AEM.
Expertise in AEM and associated technologies like Sling, OSGI, Felix, Jackrabbit, JCR, CRX.
Experience leading large sized teams and technology engagements, including client and consulting staff.
Experience conceptualizing, designing, building, and deploying Enterprise Content Management solutions.
Relevant working experience including expertise in “Enterprise Architecture” consulting skills such as interviewing stakeholders, conducting architecture reviews, and consensus building.
Professional and consultative mindset with commitment for excellent customer service.
Excellent interpersonal and communication skills (both written and oral).
Ability to come up with creative solutions for ambiguous problems and learn quickly.
Practical expertise in performance tuning and optimizing bottleneck problems analysis.
Solid technical expertise and troubleshooting skills.
Fluent oral, written English and strong presentation skills.Essential Qualifications:Bachelors degree (BE, BTech) in Computer Science, or Engineering OR equivalent experience and knowledge required.
Good mentoring skills and enablement through thought leadership.Job Details
